version_description: We updated the look of several lanes, improved multiplayer, spruced up our store, and fixed a couple bugs. We are always working hard to bring you the best mobile bowling experience. See you on the lanes.

The leaves are falling and so are the pins in PBA Challenge. That could only mean one thing: Cemetery Alley is back! But that's not all, a batch of scary branded balls and the new Candy Corn and Candy Apple ball. It’s all treat and no trick for you!

We not only updated our lineup of PBA Pros but we also added new flag balls and soccer - er, football, depending where you live - balls that will be available based on your country. We also fixed a ton - or metric tonne, depending where you live - of bugs and quirks especially in multiplayer to bring you a more enjoyable experience. Bowl a turkey!
Happy holidays! We've updated the game for holiday-themed balls! And squashed bugs! Ho! Ho! Ho!

"Based on the overwhelming response to our poll, we've added the new Lanes of Route 66! Bowl along the Mother Road with three new balls: The Tumbleball, the Spare Tire, and the Spike & Strike!
Get your strikes on Route 66!"
All the cool kids hang out at the bowling alley in the summer!  So we did some maintainance to give you the best mobile bowling experience.

It's a Song of Spares & Strikes! Get ready for free gold pins with Pin Mania on the Lane of Thrones!

Also, celebrate Concrete Software's 14th Anniversary with a limited-time tournament -- and enter for a chance to win 5,000 gold pins!!!!!!!!
We're proud to unveil brand new ARROWS on The Dive venue and some minor bug fixes to make PBA Bowling Challenge an even better game!
Minor bug fix and maintainance to continue to give you the best mobile bowling expereince. Lace up your shoes and hit those lanes!
Some minor bug fixing to help with tournaments and multiplayer.
Update to the Limited Time Events system to allow us more flexibility and you more options! Look for a surprise in the coming weeks!
Career mode extension and additional bug fixes and improvements.

The PBA is turning 60 years old in February 2018, and PBA Bowling Challenge is celebrating with a new bowling lane and a huge new tournament!

We are also introducing a new play mode: Weekend Challenges! Each Friday the Weekend Challenge begins anew with different locations, balls, opponents, difficulty levels, and in-game rewards. Fight your way to the end for prizes and glory!
Fix for iOS 8 and 9
A small fix so you can see your trophies without issue
Progressive Tournament fixes and other various bugs resolved.
Update to the Limited Time Events system to allow us more flexibility and you more options! Look for a surprise in the coming weeks!

We're building on the success of the Weekend Challenge with a brand new special event -- The Commissioner's Challenge! Battle each PBA pro for big prizes every step of the way!

We've also made several improvements around opponent difficulty in events such as the Weekend Challenge.

And, while we're at it, we also made several bug fixes.
Small bug fix for Commisioner's Challenge
Small bug fix for the Commissioner's Challenge
You know all those emails about Privacy Policy updates that you've been getting?  Yeah, it's that.
Check the stars for a new challenge coming soon! Some bug fixing to make it the best mobile bowling experience available.
Some bug fixing to make it the best mobile bowling experience available.
Some bug fixing to make it the best mobile bowling experience available.

Concrete Software is turning 15 years old this month! We're celebrating with a brand new special event -- The Concrete Anniversary Challenge! Starting August 15th, climb your way to the top of the cake for birthday prizes!

While we're at it, we also made several bug fixes to improve your game experience.

Concrete Software is turning 15 years old this month! We're celebrating with a brand new special event -- The Concrete Anniversary Challenge! Starting August 15th, climb your way to the top of the cake for birthday prizes!

While we're at it, we also made several bug fixes to improve your game experience.

Multiplayer changes to make it more competitive. Special powers - bomb, lightning, and split ball - no longer work in multiplayer games. Wins instead come down to pure skill! Are you up for the challenge?

We also made several bug fixes to improve your game experience.

We're getting into the Halloween spirit with a brand new spooktacular event --- The Boo-ling Tournament! Starting October 17th, battle against frightful opponents!
